705094f-b.text:
(1)
870 Jamaica Ave., south side, between Hemlock and Crescent Streets, showing the blacksmith shop of S. Platt Nicoll.  In 1882 the toll gate was opposite this building.  He operated a blacksmith shop at this place from 1870-?.  This building does not appear on the 1929 maps.

April 1923.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(2)
The same, another view; overhead is the B.M.T. Fulton Street Elevated Line.

April 1923.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
705094f-b.folder: Jamaica Avenue & Hemlock Street, Brooklyn, NY
